favourite.article: Amen! Praise the Lord that Christ is our true manna, He is all-inclusive to us.

CHRIST IS OUR REAL FOOD! OUR SUPPLY OF NOURISHMENT! WE MUST EAT HIM, O saints, may we eat Him, O may we not fall short of eating Him! What else do you need or seek? HE IS THE SOURCE OF ALL WE NEED (stanza 7). We eat Him by calling upon Him, O LORD JESUS, O LORD JESUS!
